item.title: How to Make a Github Blog
item.description: Hi, this is my way to make a Github blog for my self, which will contain blogs, some projects, and some tips from my experience. I am a webasite newbie, so it took me almost 2 days to setup from start to finish, and it’s pretty easy. Here is how I made it. Initial setup Create repositories First, let take a look at what a Github Page is, and how to create one.
